data.lyric:
[ti:Apologize]
[ar:Timbaland/OneRepublic]
[al:Timbaland Presents: Shock Value]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Apologize - Timbaland (提姆巴兰)/OneRepublic (共和时代)
[00:05.37]Lyrics by：Ryan Tedder
[00:10.75]Composed by：Ryan Tedder
[00:16.13]I'm holding on your rope got me ten feet off the ground
[00:24.03]And I'm hearing what you say but I just can't make a sound
[00:32.37]You tell me that you need me then you go and cut me down
[00:38.25]But wait
[00:40.49]You tell me that you're sorry didn't think I'd turn around
[00:46.39]And say that it's too late to apologize it's too late
[00:56.34]I said it's too late to apologize it's too late
[01:04.61]Too late oh oh
[01:13.09]I'd take another chance take a fall take a shot for you oh oh
[01:21.16]I need you like a heart needs a beat but it's nothing new
[01:27.27]Yeah yeah
[01:29.29]I loved you with a fire red now it's turning blue
[01:34.82]And you say
[01:37.63]Sorry like the angel Heaven let me think was you
[01:43.18]But I'm afraid
[01:45.54]It's too late to apologize it's too late
[01:53.16]I said it's too late to apologize
[01:57.69]It's too late oh oh
[02:20.18]It's too late to apologize it's too late
[02:27.82]I said it's too late to apologize it's too late
[02:35.89]I said it's too late to apologize yeah
[02:44.04]I said it's too late to apologize yeah
[02:52.65]I'm holding on your rope got me ten feet off the ground
data.trans:
[ti:Apologize]
[ar:Timbaland/OneRepublic]
[al:Timbaland Presents: Shock Value]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:05.37]//
[00:10.75]//
[00:16.13]我抱着一线希望 再次使我如坠深渊
[00:24.03]听懂了你的言意我却只能绝望沉默
[00:32.37]你跟我说你需要我 而现在我却伤心于你的离去
[00:38.25]只能空虚等待
[00:40.49]你的歉意是那么苍白无力 我却只能无奈的转身离去 对你说
[00:46.39]你说的对不起已是太迟 真的太迟
[00:56.34]我说过现在已是太迟 真的太迟
[01:04.61]真的太迟
[01:13.09]我想我还会努力 宁愿再次被你伤害 也再给你一次让我接受你的机会
[01:21.16]曾经我需要你就如同我的心需要跳动一样 但是往事随风而逝
[01:27.27]//
[01:29.29]曾经对你炉火般的热情 如今只剩下冷漠
[01:34.82]然后你说
[01:37.63]你天使般的道歉对我而言恰似来自天堂的妙音
[01:43.18]但是我害怕
[01:45.54]对不起你说得太迟 真的太迟
[01:53.16]我说过现在为时太迟 真的太迟
[01:57.69]真的太迟
[02:20.18]你的道歉来得太迟 真的太迟
[02:27.82]我说过现在已是太迟 真的太迟
[02:35.89]我说过现在为时太迟 真的太迟
[02:44.04]我说过现在为时太迟 真的太迟
[02:52.65]我依旧紧紧抓住你那残存的希望 再次使我如坠深渊
